DOC.brief_summary: This study will be conducted to compare the success and complication rates of ureteroscopy, and shockwaves lithotripsy for treatment of upper ureteric stones ≤1 cm.
DOC.detailed_description: This study will be conducted to compare the success and complication rates of Flexible, Semi-rigid URS, and SWL approaches for proximal ureteric stones with size ≤1 cm.
DOC.criteria: Radioopaque stones less than or equal 1 cm Active UTI Coagulopathy Pregnancy Ureteric stricture
